message_1: A park has a rectangular field of length 80 meters and width 60 meters. The park authorities want to install a rectangular fountain inside the field such that it covers the maximum area possible without overlapping the field boundary. What should be the length and width of the fountain?
message_2: To maximize the area of the rectangular fountain without overlapping the field boundary, the fountain should be installed along the entire length and width of the field. Therefore, the length of the fountain should be 80 meters, and the width should be 60 meters.
